Uses of Interface
controller.interfaces.Operation

  • Packages that use Operation 
    Package Description
    controller.operations  
    controller.specialOperations  

    • Uses of Operation in controller.operations

      Classes in controller.operations that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  And
      takes in two params and returns true if both are 1
      class  ArcTangent
      returns the arc tan of a given value
      class  Backward
      makes the turtle go backwards whatever the given param value is
      class  ClearScreen
      Clears the screen and resets all the turtles
      class  Cosine
      takes the cosine of a given param value
      class  Difference
      takes the difference of two param values
      class  Equal
      returns true if the two values are equal
      class  Forward
      moves a turtle forward a given amount
      class  GetPenColor
      returns the pen color
      class  GetShape
      returns the shape index
      class  GreaterThan
      returns 1 if the first param is greater than the second, 0 else
      class  Heading
      returns the heading of the turtle
      class  HideTurtle
      hides the turtle from the user
      class  Home
      brings the turtle back home to 0,0
      class  IsPenDown
      returns 1 if the pen is down
      class  IsShowing
      returns 1 if the turtle is showing, 0 else
      class  Left
      rotates the turtle to the left
      class  LessThan
      returns 1 if the first param is less than the second, 0 else
      class  Minus
      returns the negated value of a given parameter
      class  NaturalLog
      takes the natural log of a value
      class  Not
      returns the opposite of what is given 1, or 0
      class  NotEqual
      returns 1 if the two values are not equal 0 else
      class  Or
      returns 1 if either of the two params are 1, 0 else
      class  PenDown
      puts the pen down
      class  PenUp
      pulls the pen up
      class  Pi
      returns the Pi value
      class  Power
      returns the param at 0 to the power of param at 1
      class  Product
      returns the product of the two params
      class  Quotient
      divides param 0 by param 1
      class  Random
      returns a random digit from 1 to given param
      class  Remainder
      returns the remainder between two given parameters
      class  Right
      rotates the turtle to the right a given amount of degrees
      class  SetBackground
      sets the background to a new color
      class  SetHeading
      sets the heading to an absolute direction
      class  SetPalette
      sets the pallatte to a specific RGB value
      class  SetPenColor
      sets the pen color to a given index value
      class  SetPenSize
      sets the pen size to a given size
      class  SetPosition
      sets the position to a given coordinate of parameters
      class  SetShape
      Sets the shape to a given index
      class  SetTowards
      sets the command to go towards a given value
      class  ShowTurtle
      shows the turtle
      class  Sine
      calculates the sine of a given param
      class  Sum
      returns the sum of two parameters
      class  Tangent
      returns the tangent value of a given param
      class  Turtles
      returns the number of turtles in a window
      class  XCoordinate
      returns the x coordinate of a given turtle
      class  YCoordinate
      returns the y coordinate of a given turtle
